attributes.action: AUTISTIC PEOPLE NEED MORE SOCIAL CARE AND NHS SUPPORT
attributes.additional_details:
AUTISTIC PEOPLE IN THIS COUNTRY HAVE INADEQUATE SUPPORT FROM SOCIAL SERVICES AND NHS AROUND THE UK.

THE GOVERNMENT NEEEDS TO FIND WAYS OF GETTING MORE MONEY AND RESOURCES TO SOCIAL SERVICES AND NHS AUTHORITIES SO THAT THEY CAN PROVIDE BETTER SUPPORT TO THOSE WITH AUTISM SPECTRUM DISORDER.
